policy_description: All employees are required to work 8 hours per day, Monday to Friday, within the time window of 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM, as per departmental scheduling
All employees, including remote and onsite staff, must record their daily attendance through the company-approved attendance system
Employees are entitled to 20–30 days of paid annual leave per year, as per company policy
Employees are entitled to paid sick leave when medically unfit. A medical certificate may be required for extended or consecutive sick leave
All newly hired employees will be subject to a probation period of up to six (6) months, as per company policy and applicable employment standards
Employees are required to serve a notice period of 30 days (or as specified in their employment contract) prior to resignation
Work from home (remote work) is permitted with prior approval from the reporting manager or as per departmental guidelines
A business casual dress code must be maintained during working hours, with exceptions as required for official events
All employees are entitled to observe the official company holidays as per the published schedule
Salaries are paid monthly, typically on the last working day of the month, as per company payroll policies
Employees are required to submit all leave requests via the HR portal or designated leave system.
All employees must demonstrate professional behavior and comply with the company’s ethical standards
New employees must complete all mandatory onboarding and compliance training programs in accordance with company guidelines
Employees may work overtime only with prior approval and in accordance with company guidelines
Employees are required to use official company channels for all HR-related communications
